vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Zebulun living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.46.14;
son of: Zebulun (H2074);
brother of: Elon (H0356H) and Jahleel (H3177)
Group of se.red (סֶ֫רֶד "Sered" H5624)
§ Sardites = see Sered "fright"
descendants of Sered, the 1st born son of Zebulun
vocabInfos._es_Definition: descendiente de Séred, hijo de Zabulón
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
西烈族 这个形容詞在希伯來文的意思是 見 西烈 "驚嚇"
西布倫的長子西烈的後裔(民 26:26)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
西烈族 这个形容词在希伯来文的意思是 见 西烈 "惊吓"
西布伦的长子西烈的后裔(民 26:26)
